main

Class SupportOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.SupportOperations

  • public class SupportOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible to bridge and translate the gaps between values returned by R and that being processed by Java. It carries out translation of R data types into Java data type by using the Rengine API. It provides operations to find properties of a plot.
    Since:
    January-2016
    Author:
    prince

      • getDoubleArray

        public static double[] getDoubleArray(int size,
                                      org.rosuda.JRI.REXP rexp)
        Parameters:
        size - Size of R vector
        rexp - Superclass of R objects containing the R vector
        Returns:
        An array of double values extracted from rexp

      • stabilityAnalysis

        public static java.lang.String stabilityAnalysis(double[] arr,
                                                 int size)
        Finds the nature of iteration.
        Parameters:
        arr - An array of doubles not more than 100 values.
        size - size of the array arr
        Returns:
        The analysed nature of the vector.

      • analyseVector

        public static PlotDetails analyseVector(java.lang.String type,
                                        double[] arr,
                                        int size,
                                        float r,
                                        float A,
                                        float B,
                                        float G)
        This method analyses the nature of plot using the apriori information of piccard iteration of logistic map. For other iteration it uses the stabilityAnalysis(arr,size) method.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of map/iteration
        arr - An array of double values showing the plots of xn.
        A - A parameter b/w 0 and 1
        B - A parameter b/w 0 and 1
        G - A parameter b/w 0 and 1
        r - A parameter whose value is subject to the nature of iteration. For Piccard it exists only for interval 0 to 4.0
        size - The size of the array arr
        Returns:
        An object of PlotDetails containing the information about the plot.
